buckle
  • Reference

Cards

Handy card tools.

card(header = NULL, block = NULL, footer = NULL, text = "left",
  context = NULL, outline = FALSE, inverse = FALSE)

Arguments

header

Card header, a character vector or tag, defaults to NULL.
block

The card body, a character vector or tag(s), defaults to NULL.
footer

Card footer, a character vector or tag, defaults to NULL.
text

One of "left", "right", or "center", specifying the text alignment of the card, defaults to "left".
context

One of "primary", "success", "info", "warning", or "danger", used to add a visual context to the card, defaults to NULL.
outline

If TRUE, the card context is styled as the card outline rather than the card background, defaults to FALSE.
inverse

If TRUE, the card has a dark background and light text as opposed to the default dark text on light background, defaults to FALSE.

Contents

  • Arguments
